sections.title: Context & Role Understanding
sections.goal: Understand the interviewee's role, daily responsibilities, and how they interact with Vesta FinOps tooling.
sample_questions: Can you walk me through your typical day as a FinOps Analyst at Novereon Systems?
How does the Vesta FinOps platform fit into your workflow?
Which other teams or departments do you collaborate with most frequently?

sections.title: Current Processes & Pain Points
sections.goal: Explore existing workflows for cost monitoring, anomaly detection, and budget enforcement; identify friction points.
sample_questions: What is your process for spotting and investigating a cost anomaly?
Can you describe the last time you had to enforce a budget quota?
What parts of the current system slow you down or cause confusion?

sections.title: Tooling & Data Integration
sections.goal: Dive deeper into how data from multiple projects (e.g., Quasar Billing, Nimbus Observability) is integrated into Vesta FinOps.
sample_questions: Which upstream systems feed into your cost dashboards?
Have you encountered mismatches between billing data and observability metrics?
How do you validate the accuracy of cost allocation before reporting?

sections.title: Decision-Making & Tradeoffs
sections.goal: Understand how the interviewee balances cost savings against performance and compliance requirements.
sample_questions: Can you share an example where optimizing for cost conflicted with meeting an SLA?
How do you decide when to trigger the Idle Resource Reaper runbook?
Have you ever rejected a cost optimization because of a potential risk to availability?

sections.title: Future Needs & UX Opportunities
sections.goal: Gather ideas for improving the platform's usability, reporting, and collaboration features.
sample_questions: If you could change one thing about the Vesta FinOps UI tomorrow, what would it be?
Do you feel you have the right level of granularity in your cost reports?
What would help you communicate cost insights more effectively to non-technical stakeholders?
